channel.title: Downtime, forum lost 2 days
channel.description:
[quote="Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:317131"]At about 9pm EST time on 12-01-2009 one of the hard drives in my server ceased to function. This shut everything down and the data on the hard drive is not recoverable. This hard drive held the entire mysql database. The people at the datacenter had to put in 2 new drives, reinstall my operating system, and hook the other old drive up so I could grab files from it. So since 7am or so this morning I have been reinstalling and reconfiguring all the software on the entire server, as well as restoring the latest backup I had of all the databases (from may) and the latest backup I had of the forum (11-29-2009). I believe it is all done, but there is no way to recover any servers or anything else besides what we have now. Just repost them.
Thanks for understanding.[/quote]

item.title: Downtime, forum lost 2 days
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

sorry about you losing your hunting trip!!

Anyways, thanks for ruining my life the past day or so

Read full topic

item.title: Downtime, forum lost 2 days
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:12, topic:317132”]why the fuck would you back up code more recently than data

edit: unless you mean every database and just the forums database recently…[/quote]

The hard drive with the database is the one that crashed, the one with the code I managed to recover. And my script just backed up the forum database on a regular basis.

Read full topic
